sentences.english: The tree is smaller than other orange trees, with slender twigs and lance-shaped leaves.
sentences.chinese: 橘樹株形小於其它柑橘類果樹，枝條細，葉呈矛狀。

sentences.english: Why people would like to plant peaches and plums, oranges can also become green and blooming.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大家只說要栽桃李，難道橘樹就不能碧綠成陰？

sentences.english: At the end of the 18th century, Hyères was a village surrounded by orange tree plantations.
sentences.chinese: 18世紀末，耶爾是個被橘樹果園包圍的城市。

sentences.english: In the cold Qing Dynasy, oranges grown in Jiangxi have been frozen to death.
sentences.chinese: 而在寒冷的清朝，江西的橘樹都被凍死過。
